name: Town
night_description: Default town. Vote out the mafia to win.

name: Medic
night_description: Protect a player from the mafia at night. You cannot protect the same person two nights in a row.

name: Cop
night_description:
Compare a player to the player you chose the night before. 
For example: Night 1 -> checked Evan, Night 2 -> checked Emma, Response: They are on opposite teams!
If the players are on the same team, they are either both town, both mafia, or both neutrals.

name: Mafia
night_description: Vote to kill a player. All members of the mafia must be in agreement.
